title: iBeeziWear
summary: The ultimate keyboard for smartwatches. Beautiful, intuitive, seamless, fun.
description: iBeezi® - the ultimate keyboard for smartwatches. Beautiful, intuitive, seamless, fun.*** Selected as one of the most promising apps for 2015 – Rise (Hong Kong), Web Summit ***iBeezi® is the first keyboard ever to offer a high quality solution for writing on a smartwatch. With its attractive design and intuitive interface, iBeezi® is set to become the reference keyboard for any smartwatch.Why people love iBeezi®:✓BEAUTIFUL, MINIMAL DESIGN – 6 keys only. Period.✓ INTUITIVE INTERFACE – Typing becomes as easy as reading time. ✓ FAST AND PLAYFUL EXPERIENCE – Reach any letter in a matter of seconds.✓ BIG KEYS – With iBeezi® you will never miss a key again. Discover the power of the iBeezi® logic in the Quick Start Guide and start writing immediately on your smartwatch!iBeezi is compatible with popular apps calling for characters input, such as Wear Messenger, and maximizes the usage thereof.GET IN TOUCHVisit http://ibeezi.com or Contact us at info@ibeezi.com to :• Share ideas with the iBeezy® community• Give product feedback• Get assistancePRIVACYThe iBeezi® keyboard does not store any data on your device about your typing tendencies. We do not collect typing data remotely and will not do so without first asking you. WEBSITEVisit us at http://ibeezi.com for more information on the iBeezi® app.
descriptionHTML:
iBeezi® - the ultimate keyboard for smartwatches. Beautiful, intuitive, seamless, fun.


*** Selected as one of the most promising apps for 2015 – Rise (Hong Kong), Web Summit ***


iBeezi® is the first keyboard ever to offer a high quality solution for writing on a smartwatch. With its attractive design and intuitive interface, iBeezi® is set to become the reference keyboard for any smartwatch.


Why people love iBeezi®:


✓BEAUTIFUL, MINIMAL DESIGN – 6 keys only. Period.
✓ INTUITIVE INTERFACE – Typing becomes as easy as reading time.
✓ FAST AND PLAYFUL EXPERIENCE – Reach any letter in a matter of seconds.
✓ BIG KEYS – With iBeezi® you will never miss a key again.


Discover the power of the iBeezi® logic in the Quick Start Guide and start writing immediately on your smartwatch!

iBeezi is compatible with popular apps calling for characters input, such as Wear Messenger, and maximizes the usage thereof.


GET IN TOUCH

Visit http://ibeezi.com or
Contact us at info@ibeezi.com to :

• Share ideas with the iBeezy® community
• Give product feedback
• Get assistance


PRIVACY

The iBeezi® keyboard does not store any data on your device about your typing tendencies. We do not collect typing data remotely and will not do so without first asking you.


WEBSITE

Visit us at http://ibeezi.com for more information on the iBeezi® app.
